name: Bubble Baller
tagline: Get the ball in the hoop!
body:
**Bubble Baller  **

![Bubble Baller](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/33753455/BubbleBaller.png)

Bubble-Baller is a Cocos2d based game with a simple concept: get the ball in the hoop.

**_Download and install link_**

[Bubble Baller](https://ota.io/bdymco)

***

## Challenges

* Getting a storyboard attached to Cocos2d
* Getting graphics to show up right
* Creating the physics for the environment and objects.
* Collisions in Cocos2d
* Actions based on in game events

***

## Successes

* Got Cocos2d working
* Able to get environment physics working
* Collisions were implemented successfully
* Able to have a game like experience

***

## More Time

* More levels
* Get settings and exit working
* Add movement to hoop
* Add more balls
* Make physics more realistic
* Improve depreciated code

***

App testing is open to all RVC faculty, staff, and students.

If you want to test apps, here is what you need you to do:

1) Download and Install UDID Tool App (Free) to your iPhone, iPad, or iTouch.

https://itunes.apple.com/en/app/udid-tool/id377602501

2) After installed, Run the UDID Tool App

3) Click the "Send Email" button

4) Send email to: c.konkol@rockvalleycollege.edu

5) I will send you an email with instructions on how to test the apps. 
   It shouldn't take you a few minutes per app.
